Label: Plot (or subplot) area
Description: Size of the plot in ha

Label: What the unit for plot area?
What is your year of measurement?
Tree unique identifiers
helpText: matching the tag number in the field. It can be the same as tree ID.
Description: Tree unique identifiers, matching the tag number in the field if that column was provided in the input, automatically generated if not.

Label: Tree ID
Description: Tree unique identifiers. This was automatically generated if not provided in the input data

Label: Stem ID
helpText: if each stem of one tree does not get unique tag

Label: Measure ID
helpText: if you measured more than one DBH per tree
Description: measure unique identifier if you had more than one measure per stem per year

Label: Life status
helpText: where you say the tree is dead or alive
Description: Logical: TRUE is tree was alive, FALSE if it was dead

Label: Which of your status(es) represent a LIVE tree?
DBH
Description: Diameter at breast height in cm

Label: Tree X euclidean position in plot
helpText: position of the tree relative to the Southwestern corner of the subplot
Description: Tree X euclidean position in plot in m

Label: Tree Y euclidean position in plot
helpText: position of the tree relative to the Southwestern corner of the subplot
Description: Tree Y euclidean position in plot in m

Label: Commercial species indicator
Description: Logical: TRUE if species is considered commercial, FALSE if not

Label: Which of the following(s) indicate a commercial species?
What is your tree height unit?
Character separating Genus and Species in Scientific name
